CHAT.comment: HAWAII, ET AL., Petitioners v. OFFICE OF HAWAIIAN AFFAIRS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK J. BENNETT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM M. JAY ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KANNON K. SHANMUGAM ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MARK J. BENNETT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:10 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
